job.title: Data / Data Lake Engineer
job.description: <br><p>Required Experience</p><p><br></p><p>Infrastructure on the data side experience</p><p><br></p><p>Software design, Data Exposure</p><p><br></p><p>Data lake build experience</p><p><br></p><p>Load capacity testing</p><p><br></p><p>Data Lake environments</p><p><br></p><p>Make best practice decisions on use of best Data practices such as (NoSQL/MySQL), streaming media/Not streaming media. Need resource to help give them the structure we need</p><p><br></p><p>Apache Spark</p><p><br></p><p>SQL</p><p><br></p><p>Mongo DB</p><p><br></p><p>Speak to configuration of environments (Best use for Builds- from and architectural perspective)</p><p><br></p><p>Nice to Haves</p><p><br></p><p>Delta Lake</p>
